data.title: Seminole Hard Rock Hollywood Construction
data.meta_description: Superior assisted with the construction of Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Hollywood, Florida. Superior’s role on the project was steel erection.
data.text:
Construction of Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino

In 2018, Superior had the pleasure of assisting with the construction of Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino, the flagship property for Seminole Gaming, located in Hollywood, Florida. The hotel is the centerpiece of a 1.5-billion-dollar complex at the tribe’s Hollywood property. The back-to-back Guitar style hotel opened in October of 2019. It features 638 luxury guestrooms, a 10-acre lagoon-style pool, 30 restaurants/lounges/bars, an event venue, retail space, an expansive casino, meeting/convention space and more.

Superior’s Role in Construction

Superior’s role on the project was the amphitheater at the base of the guitar tower. Superior’s work tied the tower and the casino together using a truss that required temporary shoring towers. Each truss weighed 65,000 pounds. With the small footprint of the site, there were difficult challenges bringing in such heavy machinery and the steel. Superior teamed up with SDL to provide an erection plan that was followed and led to successful completion of the project. Superior’s expansive equipment fleet was key to making this project a success. Superior chose one of their most versatile crawler cranes in their fleet, the Liebherr LR 1300 SX crawler crane to install the steel, along with a 100-ton RT as an assist crane for the project.

Liebherr LR 1300 SX

The Liebherr LR 1300 SX has a loading capacity of 660,000 lbs. with a maximum hoisting height of 554 ft. and a radius up to 377 ft.. This crawler crane is primarily designed for lifting work with high loads and can be easily assembled and disassembled. It is used in various industries such as steel erection, pre-cast erection and machine setting.

The project made the 2019 Liebherr calendar and was featured on their website.

Superior Rigging & Erecting provides solutions for projects requiring heavy steel, erecting and rigging needs. With more than 65 years of operation, Superior Rigging & Erecting has the experience, and industry-wide reputation, for mobilizing the most complicated heavy steel projects. The company undertakes the most complex projects and is available for operation nationally, from coast-to-coast.

Superior Rigging & Erecting Co. is proud to have supported this remarkable project and looks forward to continually making the tough jobs look easy, in Georgia, Florida and throughout the nation.

Learn More About The Hotel HERE.

Superior Rigging & Erecting was founded in 1952 and has locations in Atlanta, Ga. and Orlando, Fl. We have developed a reputation for completing complicated projects with ease. Services offered include: crane rental, heavy transport, machinery moving, millwrighting, precast architectural, ride system install, specialized rigging, steel erection, steel fabrication, and warehousing. With wide-ranging services and more than 65 years of operation, Superior Rigging & Erecting offers seamless solutions to the most complex projects. Comprehensive rental options include: cranes, forklifts, tractor-trailer, accessory equipment and more. Benefits of choosing Superior Rigging & Erecting include an expansive equipment fleet which ensures quick availability, a comprehensive preventative maintenance program resulting in safe productivity and a commitment to a zero-accident environment, implemented with an active safety staff requiring complete, ongoing training. Superior Rigging & Erecting: making the tough jobs look easy since 1952.
